mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}
